name: AlgoECartEscrow
description: Secure escrow contract for Algo-E-Cart marketplace

source.approval:
#pragma version 7
txn ApplicationID
int 0
==
bnz main_l4
txna ApplicationArgs 0
byte "release"
==
bnz main_l3
err
main_l3:
txn Sender
byte "admin"
app_global_get
==
assert
itxn_begin
int pay
itxn_field TypeEnum
byte "seller"
app_global_get
itxn_field Receiver
byte "amount"
app_global_get
itxn_field Amount
int 0
itxn_field Fee
itxn_submit
int 1
return
main_l4:
txn NumAppArgs
int 3
==
assert
byte "admin"
txn Sender
app_global_put
byte "seller"
txna ApplicationArgs 1
app_global_put
byte "amount"
txna ApplicationArgs 2
btoi
app_global_put
int 1
return

methods.name: release
methods.desc: Release escrow funds to seller (admin only)
